categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems military bases

nodes.text: This CIS mining base was located on the planet of Christophsis during the Clone Wars. It was there where CIS Miner droids dropped off their load of force crystals. It was used as a base and a factory for battle droids.

During the Clone Wars, Padmé Amidala and Captain Rex were investigating on the planet. They discovered the base and the miners from the CIS. Padmé and Rex instantly reported to the Jedi Council, but during the conversation, she and her protector were attacked and captured. Yoda then sent two Jedi to the planet to rescue the senator and clone trooper, and investigate the scene. Soon after, however, two more Jedi were sent to the base along with Padmé, Rex, C-3PO, and R2-D2. It was here that the Jedi learn of the Devastation from R2-D2 and C-3PO. Soon after, the two Jedi found Count Dooku, and sought to attack when Dooku escaped.
